verses.text: I said, “I will watch \w my|strong="H1732"\w* ways, so \w that|strong="H1732"\w* I don’t sin \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* tongue. I will keep \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridle while \w the|strong="H1732"\w* wicked \w is|strong="H1732"\w* before me.”

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* mute \w with|strong="H6310"\w* silence. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* held \w my|strong="H8104"\w* peace, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* good. \w My|strong="H8104"\w* sorrow \w was|strong="H6310"\w* stirred.
My heart \w was|strong="H3511"\w* hot within me. While I meditated, \w the|strong="H2896"\w* fire burned. I spoke \w with|strong="H2896"\w* my tongue:

“\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, show \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* end, \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* days. Let \w me|strong="H1696"\w* know how frail \w I|strong="H3820"\w* am.

Behold, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* hand widths. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. Surely \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* stands \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath.” \qs Selah.\qs*

“\w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* walks \w like|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shadow. \w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* busy \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* heaps \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* doesn’t \w know|strong="H5048"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* gather.

\w Now|strong="H1980"\w*, Lord, \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w do|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* wait \w for|strong="H3045"\w*? \w My|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

Deliver \w me|strong="H4100"\w* from all \w my|strong="H6258"\w* transgressions. Don’t make \w me|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* reproach \w of|strong="H8431"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* foolish.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* mute. \w I|strong="H7760"\w* didn’t open \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* did \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w Remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* scourge away \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am overcome \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* blow \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* hand.

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rebuke \w and|strong="H3027"\w* correct man \w for|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wealth \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moth. Surely every man \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath.” \qs Selah.\qs*

“Hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1892"\w* give ear \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry. Don’t \w be|strong="H3605"\w* silent \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tears. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreigner, \w as|strong="H6211"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w were|strong="H5921"\w*.

Oh spare \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* recover strength, \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* exist \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w*.”
